name: Cherry Bomb
description:
Cherry bomb is set in a distant future where advanced AI was created by a scientist named Vince. Influenced by how the humans treated each other, the AI decided that the humans are not worth keeping alive. The AI created robots with only one purpose, destroy mankind.

Human population plummeted fast when the attacks started. A young scientist named Leo started to create super soldiers in an underground lab with the help of other survivors.

Take control of Leo and send your super soldiers to fight the robots.

Controls:

WASD- Movement

"1" Key- Summon Units

Q - Commands Units to attack

E - Commands Units to Follow

P - Retry
